channel.title: Question about rep. It's a legit question. Don't ban
channel.description: Before the whole rep reset, I had 2 rep. Now, since the rep reset happened, I got one. So, if it were to actually show how much rep people had, I'd have 13 rep correct? Well, I was just wondering that when I get 2 more rep, will I be able to give rep, or will I need 4 more. I don't need little faggots telling me this question is against the rules. This is a real question that deserves an answer. Thanks if you can answer =)

item.title: Question about rep. It's a legit question. Don't ban

I’ve gained 24 rep on Moparisthebest, only now can I rep people. btw, you can talk about rep in general, but you can’t ask for it.
